alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Baca, east central Las Animas and southern Bent Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Higbee to 13 miles east of Kim. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pritchett, Kim, John Martin Reservoir and Caddoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
